Welcome!

December 05, 2017

Welcome!

I spent the past day and a half diving in to Jekyll to set up this blog, and now I'm going to talk about it:

I followed css-tricks' tutorial to set up the blog itself. I only followed part one so far, and when I set up comments, I will probably skip to part three since part two is about setting up a CMS, and I'm the only one writing this blog so ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

To set up the tagging system, Charlie Park's tutorial was a lifesaver.

For now, watch this space for further development! Mostly new blog posts, and hopefully soon a comments system.
